reqs:
Pre-reqs: A score of 68% or higher in MATH 226.
The SIS will enforce automatically prerequisites for this course. Students will not be able to register themselves if they do not have the correct prerequisites. If you need to get your UBC file updated with qualifications such as Transfer Credits, take care of that by sending documentation to admissions.inquiry@ubc.ca.
description: Parametrization of curves and surfaces; line and surface integrals; theorems of Green, Gauss, Stokes; applications to physics and/or introduction to differential forms. Please consult the Faculty of Science Credit Exclusion List: www.students.ubc.ca/calendar/index.cfm?tree=12,215,410,414.
